nodes.text: Mekuun Corporation was known for its heavy repulsorlift vehicles.
During the Clone Wars, Mekuun manufactured the HAET-221, and worked jointly with Kuat Drive Yards to produce the UT-AT for the Grand Army of the Republic.
A number of repulsor coils used to build their repulsorlifts were manufactured by Arden Repulsorlift Plant on Bakura.
